Room.Name: Ashton Creek
Room.ShortDescription: You are wading in the rushing waters of Ashton creek.
Room.LongDescription: To the west is a stone cottage near the bank and in a cleared area, and to the east are great boulders on the shore line. To the north the stream tumbles over a broad but shallow waterfall. In the distance to the north you can see a rope bridge traversing the stream where it narrows and starts to run deep.
